permissions: Allowed for admins. Non-admins can update their own predictions; they can update consensus predictions only if they have can_update_prediction_consensus on the prediction subject, and can update others non-consensus predictions only if they have can_update_or_destroy_others_predictions.
side_effects: Updates a prediction record. May recompute continuous ranked probability score and may reset the prediction subject domain when status or probability distribution changes.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one of --status or --probability-distribution must be provided. Status must be one of: draft, submitted, abandoned. --probability-distribution must be valid JSON when provided; empty string clears the value. If this prediction is the consensus prediction and there are dependent gaps, status and probability-distribution cannot be changed.

flags.name: --probability-distribution
flags.validation: Must be valid JSON when provided; payload includes class_name. An empty string clears the value.
